quest.name: Keeping the Flame Alive
journal: Hozan would brief you on the mission to rescue Raubahn.
There is no telling when Raubahn may be executed. Make your preparations without delay, and signal your readiness to begin the mission to the waiting Hozan.
With the aid of Alphinaud and Yugiri, you have succeeded in rescuing Raubahn from the clutches of the traitorous Crystal Braves. Make your way back outside to eastern Thanalan.
You emerge in the hot desert air. Speak with Doware, who awaits your return.

Outside Halatali, you are approached by a messenger, who claims that his mistress is sympathetic to your cause. For your own safety, he bids you make your way to the Waking Sands. Speak with Alphinaud to learn what he thinks of this mysterious invitation.
Alphinaud is sufficiently convinced that the messenger and his mistress can be trusted. Do as bade and make your way to western Thanalan, where your old haunt the Waking Sands still stands.

Upon arriving at the Waking Sands, you are greeted by a number of familiar faces─Urianger, Pipin, and Papashan. Soon after, it is revealed that the messenger's mistress is no less an individual than Dewlala, head of the Order of Nald'thal and member of the Syndicate. To Raubahn's immense relief, she confirms Alphinaud's suspicion that Nanamo is still alive, and goes on to speculate that the sultana may be confined somewhere in a state of induced slumber. Trouble Alphinaud for his thoughts on these revelations.
Alphinaud thanks you for your part in Raubahn's rescue. With the Flame General safe, your work in Ul'dah is done for now.
objectives: Speak with Doware in front of Halatali.

dialogue.name: HOUZAN
dialogue.text: There is no time to lose─General Aldynn may be executed at any moment. You must enter Halatali and free him from his captors.

dialogue.name: HOUZAN
dialogue.text: Please see to your preparations, and tell me when you are ready to proceed. One of our own will accompany you inside.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Raubahn's ties to Halatali are well known. That Ilberd should choose this of all places to stage his execution is no coincidence. The fiend... Are there no depths to which he will not stoop?

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: He is bound by some manner of magitek device. Yet I dare not force it open─it may well be booby-trapped.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I have heard of such devices. The Crystal Braves will possess the key. Let us split up and look for it.

dialogue.name: YUYUHASE
dialogue.text: (-???-)That will not be necessary.

dialogue.name: YUYUHASE
dialogue.text: Pray do not take it personally, my friends. You are the victims of harsh economic conditions.

dialogue.name: YUYUHASE
dialogue.text: Happily, you will not suffer for long. This poison will convey you swiftly unto the bosom of Thal, where I hope to join you, after the passing of many prosperous years.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: My...thanks... <cough>

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Slowly, General. You are yet weak from your ordeal.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Nevertheless, we must quit this place.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: I should have known. What are clever contrivances to the Warrior of Light? ...Well done, hero.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ilberd...

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: You mean to struggle on, then? Very well. If you would stand in my way, I will cut you down like all the rest.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: Come, Scions─let's get this over with.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: The General is safe. What news without?

dialogue.name: DOUWARE
dialogue.text: My lady. The guards have been subdued, as per your command.

dialogue.name: DOUWARE
dialogue.text: We have since kept watch over the entrance. There has been no further activity.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Then Ilberd and his minions have fled via some other egress. Scour the perimeter for signs of their passing.

dialogue.name: DOUWARE
dialogue.text: At once, my lady!

dialogue.name: MESSENGER01601
dialogue.text: General Aldynn, I presume, and the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Who are you!? Identify yourself!

dialogue.name: MESSENGER01601
dialogue.text: Pray do not be alarmed. My mistress is a friend, and I come bearing a message of goodwill.

dialogue.name: MESSENGER01601
dialogue.text: For your own safety, she bade me direct your steps to the Waking Sands. Know that Master Urianger awaits you there, along with others sympathetic to your cause.

dialogue.name: MESSENGER01601
dialogue.text: This is no ruse, I assure you. General Aldynn─if you will come with me, I have prepared a carriage, that you may travel in comfort, safe from prying eyes.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I have spoken with Urianger via linkpearl. He confirms the man's story.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Raubahn is in safe hands. Let us make our own way to Vesper Bay.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Raubahn is in safe hands. Let us make our own way to Vesper Bay.

dialogue.name: MESSENGER01601
dialogue.text: It is only prudent to be wary, but you may be assured that this is no ruse. Pray leave the care of General Aldynn to us, and make your way to the Waking Sands. Friends await you there.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Be at ease, my friend. I have an idea who this messenger's mistress might be...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I had not counted on Prioress Dewlala herself appearing. In my defense, my suspicions regarding the sultana proved more prescient.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Much remains to be done, but in rescuing Raubahn, we have taken a vital first step towards resolving matters in Ul'dah. We couldn't have done it without you, Forename. Thank you.

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: Thank you for rescuing General Raubahn. From the bottom of my heart. To behold him now, gaunt and unkempt... It pains me to think of all the hardship he has endured.

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: I shall not forget what you have done for General Raubahn. You have saved more than just a man.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Rescue Raubahn!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Raubahn's Vitality

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Not a soul from the Coliseum to be seen. This bodes ill.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Take the lead, Forename. I shall follow close upon you.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: The General...but where are his captors? I mislike the look of this.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: General!

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: You...came...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Destroy the portcullis!

dialogue.name: YUYUHASE
dialogue.text: Farewell, friends. Oh, and do try to relax. They tell me struggling only makes it worse.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: <cough> Leave me... <splutter> Save yourselves...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We cannot let them escape! Forename, force the gate!

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: I cannot die... Not yet...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: The General fades... We must hurry!

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Confound it! The mist stifles my healing!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...Beasts!? The mist must be drawing them!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Destroy the source of the mist!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Hah! The way is clear!

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: The mist remains... We must stop it at the source!

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I shall tend to the General! Pray see to the mist and the key!

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: The Braves...have the key...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Defeat Crystal Braves and obtain the key.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: That takes care of the mist!

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: The mist has cleared!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Next, to find the key and free Raubahn!

dialogue.name: CRYSTALA
dialogue.text: How did they survive the poison!?

dialogue.name: CRYSTALB
dialogue.text: Bah, looks like we'll just have to finish the job!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The key! Take it to Raubahn!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Defeat Ilberd of the Dull Blade!

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: The sultana's assassins are here! Crystal Braves, to arms!

dialogue.name: YUYUHASE
dialogue.text: Whatever it takes to survive!

dialogue.name: LAURENTIUS
dialogue.text: I am no hero─never was, and never will be!

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: My strength...has left me...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ungh... I was careless...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I leave...the rest to you...

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Ugh... Nanamo...

obj.n: To Siege or Not to Siege
